parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch top="1">
  <entity name="cat_deploymentrequest">
    <attribute name="cat_deploymentstepid" />
    <attribute name="cat_deploymentprofileid" />
    <attribute name="cat_requesttype" />
    <attribute name="cat_solutionname" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="cat_requesttype" operator="eq" value="809060004" />
      <filter type="or">
          <condition attribute="cat_solutionname" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/OutputParameters/ArtifactName']}" />
          <condition attribute="cat_solutionname" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/OutputParameters/ArtifactName']}-@{outputs('Get_Development_Environment')?['body/environmentid']}" />
      </filter>
    </filter>
    <order attribute="createdon" descending="true" />
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch top="1">
  <entity name="cat_deploymentprofile">
    <attribute name="cat_deploymentprofileid" />
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="cat_defaultdeploymentprofile" operator="eq" value="1" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="cat_deploymentstep">
    <attribute name="cat_name" />        
    <attribute name="cat_deploymentenvironmentid" />    
    <attribute name="cat_approvaltype" />    
    <attribute name="cat_buildtemplatepath" />    
    <attribute name="cat_steptype" />    

     <filter>
      <condition attribute="cat_deploymentprofileid" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Retrieve_the_Profile')?['body/cat_deploymentprofileid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="deploymentstage">
    <attribute name="deploymentstageid" />
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="previousdeploymentstageid" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Retrieve_the_Deployment_Stage')?['body/deploymentstageid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch top="1">
  <entity name="cat_deploymentsolutionprofile">
    <attribute name="cat_deploymentprofileid" />
    <filter type="and">
          <condition attribute="cat_solutionname" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/OutputParameters/ArtifactName']}" />
          <condition attribute="cat_makerenvironmentid" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Get_Development_Environment')?['body/environmentid']}" />
    </filter>
    <order attribute="createdon" descending="true" />
  </entity>
</fetch>

variables.name: BranchToCreate
variables.value: Commit to existing branch specified in Branch parameter
